entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `System.Timers.Timer` starts in disabled state when setting interval value #98280
  • Support `DOTNET_CLI_HOME` for `corefx` #98276

Closed

  • Regex.Match(string input, int startat) method fails to give expected result when startat is larger than 0 #98282
  • [API Proposal]: IZero and IOne interfaces #96915

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: isinst(cls, null) -> null #98284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that SetContainsAVX passes in the regSize #98283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use intrinsics in TensorPrimitives.PopCount for sizeof(T) == 1 #98281
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][jit] Fix the alignment of stack slots used to pass HFA argumen… #98279
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use intrinsics in TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount #98275
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Move more casts to the late cast expansion phase #98273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/7.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98244
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [release/8.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98241
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [release/6.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98246
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Revert "Add missing test case for BitCast (#97983)" #98272
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FK_3{A,B,C}, EJ_3A, EK_3A, EY_3B, EW_3{A,B} #98187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Update where and when vzeroupper is emitted #98261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • This is an incomplete implementation of a new randomized allocation s… #98167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid allocating HashSet in Distinct() for some counts #97845
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix constant folding for arm64 MultiplyByScalar operations involving Vector2.One #98150
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix URL encoding of HttpUtility.ParseQueryString's ToString method #98263
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • dotnet build /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true doesn't work #16325
    Discussion
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716
  • System.CodeDom.dll is copied to the output/build directory when referencing System.Management v8 #38679
  • .NET SDK fails to resolve transitive references in standard macOS $TMPDIR and other symlinked directories #37687

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add RegisterSyntaxNodeStartAction to allow analyzers to immediately bail out from analyzing a file prior to processing nodes. #72053
  • IDE0270 - Cannot simplify for nullable implicit casts #72052
    Backlog
  • Collection expressions lose null safety. #72051
  • Warning AD0001 : Analyzer '' threw an exception of type 'System.NullReferenceException' with message 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.'. #72046

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch analyzer to be a syntax node analyzer #72049
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prevent 'InvalidOperationException' when array is null #72048
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix quick info for anonymous types not escaping identifiers named as keywords #72047
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Only walk into nodes with directives when processing tree for nullable directives. #72050
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove "is final document state" from compilation trackers. #72045
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MaximumParallelInvocationsPerClient > 1 breaks file upload in Blazor Server mode #53951
  • Postback on blazor InteractiveServer doesn't work #53950
  • Perf regression: fortunes #53948
  • DotNet.createJSObjectReference TS Type (transfer from DotNet.createJSObjectReference, Issue #530)) #53944
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #53942
  • Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 () _framework/dotnet.js.map for safari browser blazor web assembly #53941

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mapaction #53934
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plainTextSansFilter #53939
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter, single_query, single_query #53943
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #53904

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToolbarItem icon doesn't work with MVVM Binding on iOS #20508
  • ToolbarItem lacks keyboard accelerator feature as Accelerators property is made Obsolete in favor of KeyboardAccelerators, which is defined at the MenuFlyoutItem level #20504
  • [Regression] [Android] [Maps] Map locks up after rendering 50 Polylines #20502

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    community ✨
  • Revert "Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #20509
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update Cake #20475
  • [net9.0] ] Update net9.0 with main #20484
  • UI Test logs still aren't pushing to CI #20485

Updated

  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    community ✨
  • [Android] Pickers' reopening in collections #20437
    community ✨
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • Remove allocation from Color.TryParse #20446
  • Make sure to await async test asserts #19994
    area/testing, stale
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Core remapping alternate take #18635
    stale, .NET 8 SR4
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale, .NET 8 SR3

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Concat on string property Error #33061
  • ModelBuilder tests failing on PG because of problematic set comparison #33059
  • Cosmos Hangs on OnModelCreating While Configuring Entity #33057
  • MigrationsInfrastructureTestBase contains SQL Server-specific code #33056
  • NullReferenceException getting navigational property just set (using lazy loading) #33055

Closed

  • Why isn't modelBuilder.Model.GetEntityTypes() returning all entities? #33013

PullRequests

Created

  • 32943-Sugar for HierarchyId path generation #33062
  • Small fixes done during EFCore.PG 9.0.0-preview.1 sync #33060

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #33004 - Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complextypes with TPH entities #33054
    Servicing-consider
  • [TEST ONLY] moving tests for #32972 to relational so we also test SqLite #33050
    auto-merge
